mapper.sql: SELECT id, name, abbreviation, origin, specification, pack, units, unit_cost, amount, user_id, time FROM tb_inventory_info
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_inventory_info( id, name, abbreviation, origin, specification, pack, units, unit_cost, amount, user_id, time) VALUE(#{id}, #{name},#{abbreviation},#{origin}, #{specification}, #{pack},#{units},#{unitCost},#{amount},#{user.account},#{time})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_inventory_info SET name=#{name}, abbreviation=#{abbreviation}, origin=#{origin}, specification=#{specification}, pack=#{pack}, units=#{units}, unit_cost=#{unitCost}, amount=#{amount}, user_id=#{user.account}, time=#{time} WHERE id=#{id}
